original_title: Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band - Darkness on the Edge of Town: Paramount Theatre, Asbury Park 2009
overview: An intimate and complete album performance of "Darkness on the Edge of Town" at Paramount Theatre in Asbury Park, New Jersey, shot in 2009. Never-before seen archival footage from the Thrill Hill Vault including complete song performances taken from private band rehearsals, studio sessions, and live concerts during the “Darkness” era.
title: Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band - Darkness on the Edge of Town: Paramount Theatre, Asbury Park 2009
